head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths DONNELLY, ROBERT J.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths DONNELLY, ROBERT J.

block.p: DONNELLY-Robert J., on June 7, 2000. Your sweet nature, your quick wit, your dry humor and your courage will be greatly missed by your three sisters, Cecelia Moore, Eileen Martin and Cathy Caraccio, by your fiancee, Linda Hanauer, and by all of your many friends. We will remember your kindness, your warmth and the twinkle in your eyes. Viewing hours are 2-5pm and 7-9:30pm Wednesday, June 14, and Thursday, June 15, Greenwich Village Funeral Home, 199 Bleecker St. Contributions in Bob's memory may be sent to Calvary Hospital in the Bronx.
